    query={
        "span_near": {
            "clauses": [
                {
                    "span_term": {
                        "text": "quick brown"
                    }
                },
                {
                    "span_field_masking": {
                        "query": {
                            "span_term": {
                                "text.stems": "fox"
                            }
                        },
                        "field": "text"
                    }
                }
            ],
            "slop": 5,
            "in_order": False
        }
    },
    highlight={
        "require_field_match": False,
        "fields": {
            "*": {}
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
